person.handwriting: "This is a fluent and proficient letter hand. It is large and clear with ligatures kept to a minimum. The opening and the final salutations in two lines betray some elegance. The same hand writes the whole letter in an identical style, including final greeting and date. The letter is correctly written only in the formulaic parts; the rest contains every kind of error. It was dictated to a scribe." (Bagnall-Cribiore 2006, 274)
